nodes.text: Dramath the Second's datacron was a datacron or data holocron in which was inscribed information about the history and life of the Sith Lord Dramath the Second. It told about his life on the planet of Medriaas, and how his father was defeated and slain by his illegitimate son and Dramath the Second's half brother Tenebrae, and how Dramath then fled Medriaas and came to the world of Rekkiad. It was buried inside his sarcophagus, located inside his tomb, where Revan found it.
